content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

With a simple pull out design for total ease, your guests will be asleep in no time.

Perfectly functional and comfortable as any standard sofa for everyday use. Ideal for hotel rooms, lodges, hospitals and holiday parks.

The Congo is a double bed when extended. Cushions and piping extra – POA.

This item comes with a 2 year warranty. 11LM Needed Per Sofa.
